translation.en: Wow, nice catch.

translation.en: -What was that? -What's going on?!

translation.en: My robot!

translation.en: Boom.

translation.en: [kid] Is this what karma feels like?

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: Did I... do you a solid?

translation.en: Is our deal done?

translation.en: We're just getting started.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we only got one life to live I'm on a psychic safari ♪

translation.en: [host] Welcome back to the big show!

translation.en: It's me, Wang Nima.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[woman] You're awesome, Justin!

translation.en: Talking about this little guy, the new Q-Bot Gen 6.

translation.en: Well, I know I'm going to run right out and pick mine up.

translation.en: Oh, that's good.

translation.en: Hey, Justin. Changing subject for a second,

translation.en: Well, I mean, we've got a lot going on these days.

translation.en: [woman] What is happening? Oh!

- แม่! - อย่า

translation.en: I had nothing to fight them with.

translation.en: Okay, so your precious robot memories

translation.en: The second I believe this thing between us is real

translation.en: you burn it down to the ground like everyone else does!

translation.en: -I have you now, princess. -No!

translation.en: Am I...
Am I hearing an echo?

translation.en: Don't leave yet. [zapping]
